levels.description:
ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, DEF <@ba.vup>+{def:0%}</>, Block <@ba.vup>+{block_cnt}</>; upon receiving a melee attack from an enemy, there is a <@ba.vup>{prob:0%}</> chance to dodge and reload <@ba.vup>{recover_cnt}</> ammo
<@ba.rem>Skill activation grants {attack@trigger_time} ammo and the skill ends when all ammo is used (Can manually deactivate skill)</>
